articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: R Packages and Tools
articles.contents:
In an effort to promote collaboration on analytical projects and facilitate code replicability, weâ€™ve developed R Packages and encourage the use of git / github as a version control tool. These packages are primarily used to optimize work flows for USAID South Africa, particularly as it relates to data management and processing.
TierDrop 
TierDrop is a package to process, validate, and consolidate MER data from 2 primary data sources (TIER data from the National Department of Health (NDoH) and non-TIER data reported from implementing partners) for import to DATIM for USAID South Africa.
This package will allow users to tidy and process data from NDoH into a DATIM import file, consolidate TIER and non-TIER files, and run verification checks to build the Data Quality Reporting Trackers (DQRT).

articles.title: USAID South Africa - Strategic Information
articles.description: Welcome! This website serves as a repository of tools and project utilized by the USAID South Africa SI team for data analytics and processing of MER/PEPFAR data.
